statements.select: select * from PRoomInfo pr where pr.isValid = 1 and (select count(1) from HotelOTA ho where ho.ChannelID = 2 and ho.IsValid = 1 and ho.HotelId = pr.HotelID) > 0 --and hotelid = 541532 order by pr.HotelID
select HotelId,HotelOriID,IsValid,ChannelID,CanSyncPrice,isnull(CreateTime,getdate()) CreateTime from HotelOTA where ChannelID = 2 and IsValid = 1 and HotelId = @HotelId
select top 1 HotelOriID from HotelOTA where HotelId in (@HotelID) and ChannelID = 2 and IsValid = 1
